page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: This area is a rural area consisting of rough pastureland left fallow or used for the grazing of sheep. There are some feed crops grown for the farm animals. The farmers are usually owners and not tenants who farm on a small scale. The rest of the area is residential. It started with small isolated villages which have spread until each has mingled with the other.House building on quite a large scale has taken place over the last 8 years, vastly increasing the population.The houses are mainly owner ocupied but council owned properties are interspersed successfully on a small scale. Education is provided by 6 schools,1 High school 14-18, 1 Middle school 10-14 years and 4 First schools 4+-9.
